solution_line_template: The shampoo and conditioner cost ${shampoo_conditioner_cost_per_bottle} each so {num_shampoo_conditioner_bottles}*${shampoo_conditioner_cost_per_bottle} = $<<{num_shampoo_conditioner_bottles}*{shampoo_conditioner_cost_per_bottle}={shampoo_conditioner_total_cost}>>{shampoo_conditioner_total_cost}

{num_lotion_bottles} bottles of lotion cost ${lotion_cost_per_bottle} each so {num_lotion_bottles}*${lotion_cost_per_bottle} = $<<{num_lotion_bottles}*{lotion_cost_per_bottle}={lotion_total_cost}>>{lotion_total_cost}

You need to spend ${free_shipping_threshold} for free shipping and she has spent ${current_spent_total} already so she needs to buy ${free_shipping_threshold}-${current_spent_total} = $<<{free_shipping_threshold}-{current_spent_total}={money_needed_for_free_shipping}>>{money_needed_for_free_shipping} more in products
